main.name: Pedro Pereira
main.description: I'm a software engineer from Portugal creating software solutions for companies of all sizes
main.bio:
I am a "Full Stack" Software Engineer currently living in Penafiel, Porto, Portugal. 
 My background comes from .Net and C# but I currently am working more in the Frontend with React JS, Redux and Typescript and having a good exposure to CI/CD and AWS.
main.contactmessage: Please feel free to contact me via mail or fill the form below.

testimonials.description: I consider Pedro as an outstanding Software Developer. Worked with him at HIS and I found him very focused and dedicated to work. He is highly skilled and is always eager to help anyone when needed. His enthusiastic spirit and constant positive attitude makes the difference. He is a valuable member to any team!
testimonials.name: Tiago Ferreira

testimonials.description: I had the opportunity to work with Pedro on multiple Windows / Windows Phone projects. He is an intelligent engineer with very strong problem solving skills. Efficient, result driven and experienced. I would highly recommend him as a Software Developer.
testimonials.name: Gábor Tóth
